original_text: Moreover, I will banish from them the voice of mirth and the voice of gladness, the voice of the bridegroom and the voice of the bride, the grinding of the millstones and the light of the lamp.
korean_text: 내가 그들 중에서 기뻐하는 소리와 즐거워하는 소리와 신랑의 소리와 신부의 소리와 맷돌 소리와 등불 빛이 끊어지게 하리니

sentences.original_text: Moreover, I will banish from them
the voice of mirth and the voice of gladness
the voice of the bridegroom and the voice of the bride
the grinding of the millstones and the light of the lamp
